title: Who did Catherine Tyldesley play in Coronation Street?
text:
Catherine’s swapped soaps for sequins (Picture: PA)

Catherine Tyldesley is getting a lot out of her time on Strictly Come Dancing so far.

She’s embracing the body positivity and might have sparked a new hobby/career path for her son.

Before she was strutting her stuff on Strictly, what has the actress starred in?

Who did Catherine Tyldesley play in Corrie?

One of her most well-known roles was Coronation Street’s Eva Price.

She first appeared on the show in June 2011, and was a fan-favourite fixture of the soap until she left in August 2018.

She left temporarily in February 2015 as Catherine was pregnant with her first child.

She came back to the show in September the same year.

Throughout her time playing Eva, she was nominated for Best Actress, Best Bad Girl and Sexiest Female at the Inside Soap Awards.

She was also nominated for Best Actress at the British Soap Awards 2018.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Her time on Corrie made her a recognisable face across the country, but if it weren’t for Corrie, we might’ve seen her hit the dancefloor a bit sooner.

In an interview with PA, Tyldesley said that she had ‘spoken to [the show’s producers] before’ but ‘when you’re in Corrie they’re not going to let you… they won’t let you do it.’

Catherine added: ‘They’ll only let you do ITV things like Dancing On Ice.’

What else has Catherine Tyldesley starred in?

She currently stars in BBC One’s Scarborough.

Other credits include a recurring role in Emmerdale back in 2010, Shameless and Holby City.

She’d catch her death wearing this in Weatherfield (Picture: PA)

Strictly Come Dancing is on BBC One on Saturday night at 7.10pm.

description: Catherine Tyldesley is taking part in Strictly Come Dancing 2019. What else has she starred in and who was she in Coronation Street?
